column3: What, in your view, are the most important things Council should keep in mind when considering the future of ‘surplus’ properties or community assets which are no longer fit for purpose?
column4: Can you add any further scenarios or options to the list (A through to G) generated by the Forum?
column5: Do you have a view about which of the listed scenarios should be preferred?

column3: I think the first priority is, if they are 'occupiable', turn them into artists/creatives temporary spaces
column4: I didn't know the forum was on so i'm not sure how the scenarios were generated, but there is enough variety across the ones presented
column5: D, F and G are my preferred scenarios for this precinct.
